snippet: The latest surgeon general’s report offers astonishing new evidence of just how much harm tobacco is causing.
abstract: Editorial highlights latest surgeon general's report offering astonishing new evidence of just how much harm tobacco causes; criticizes tobacco industry for its aggressive marketing and promotion of cigarettes; calls for more vigorous tobacco-control efforts, and for the Food and Drug Administration to reduce addictiveness and harmfulness of tobacco products.
lead_paragraph: The latest surgeon general’s report offers astonishing new evidence of just how much harm tobacco is causing.

headline.main: Smoking Is Worse Than You Imagined
headline.print_headline: Smoking Is Worse Than You Imagined
